feature_model.name: eCos_compat
feature_model.feature_tree: :r ECOS (ECOS) :o CYGPKG_LINUX_COMPAT (CYGPKG_LINUX_COMPAT) :o CYGPKG_POSIX (CYGPKG_POSIX) :o _POSIX_THREAD_PRIO_INHERIT (_POSIX_THREAD_PRIO_INHERIT) :o _POSIX_THREAD_PRIO_PROTECT (_POSIX_THREAD_PRIO_PROTECT) :o _POSIX_PRIORITY_SCHEDULING (_POSIX_PRIORITY_SCHEDULING) :o CYGPKG_POSIX_PTHREAD_REQUIREMENTS (CYGPKG_POSIX_PTHREAD_REQUIREMENTS) :o _POSIX_THREADS (_POSIX_THREADS) :o _POSIX_THREAD_PRIORITY_SCHEDULING (_POSIX_THREAD_PRIORITY_SCHEDULING) :o _POSIX_THREAD_ATTR_STACKADDR (_POSIX_THREAD_ATTR_STACKADDR) :o _POSIX_THREAD_ATTR_STACKSIZE (_POSIX_THREAD_ATTR_STACKSIZE) :o _POSIX_THREAD_PROCESS_SHARED (_POSIX_THREAD_PROCESS_SHARED) :o CYGPKG_POSIX_CLOCKS (CYGPKG_POSIX_CLOCKS) :o CYGPKG_POSIX_TIMERS (CYGPKG_POSIX_TIMERS) :o CYGPKG_POSIX_SEMAPHORES (CYGPKG_POSIX_SEMAPHORES) :o CYGIMP_POSIX_MQUEUE_VALIDATE_DESCRIPTOR (CYGIMP_POSIX_MQUEUE_VALIDATE_DESCRIPTOR) :o CYGFUN_POSIX_MQUEUE_NOTIFY (CYGFUN_POSIX_MQUEUE_NOTIFY) :o CYGPKG_UITRON (CYGPKG_UITRON) :o CYGINT_UITRON_CONFORMANCE (CYGINT_UITRON_CONFORMANCE) :o CYGIMP_UITRON_STRICT_CONFORMANCE (CYGIMP_UITRON_STRICT_CONFORMANCE) :o CYGIMP_UITRON_LOOSE_CONFORMANCE (CYGIMP_UITRON_LOOSE_CONFORMANCE) :o CYGIMP_UITRON_INLINE_FUNCS (CYGIMP_UITRON_INLINE_FUNCS) :o CYGIMP_UITRON_CPP_OUTLINE_FUNCS (CYGIMP_UITRON_CPP_OUTLINE_FUNCS) :o CYGSEM_UITRON_BAD_PARAMS_RETURN_ERRORS (CYGSEM_UITRON_BAD_PARAMS_RETURN_ERRORS) :o CYGSEM_UITRON_PARAMS_NULL_IS_GOOD_PTR (CYGSEM_UITRON_PARAMS_NULL_IS_GOOD_PTR) :o CYGSEM_UITRON_TIME_IS_MILLISECONDS (CYGSEM_UITRON_TIME_IS_MILLISECONDS) :o CYGSEM_UITRON_ISRFUNCS_TRY_IMMEDIATE_EXECUTION (CYGSEM_UITRON_ISRFUNCS_TRY_IMMEDIATE_EXECUTION) :o CYGPKG_NONE (CYGPKG_NONE)
feature_model.constraints: c2: ~_POSIX_THREAD_PRIORITY_SCHEDULING or _POSIX_THREADS c3: ~CYGIMP_UITRON_STRICT_CONFORMANCE or CYGINT_UITRON_CONFORMANCE c4: ~CYGIMP_UITRON_LOOSE_CONFORMANCE or CYGINT_UITRON_CONFORMANCE cXXX: ~CYGPKG_NONE
